alert.note: Alert for Red River (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 11:56PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Red River County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raymond Gary State Park, or 16 miles east of Hugo, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bagwell, Manchester, Detroit, Redland, Silver City, Kanawha, Negley, Kiomatia, Albion and Woodland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma...and northeastern Texas.
